database

Class FileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.FileManager

  • public class FileManager
extends java.lang.Object
    File manager uses JSch in order to implement methods of uploading, downloading and deleting files from our server via sftp.
    Version:
    1.48 (15.03.15)
    Author:
    Copyright (c) 2015 EyeHouse Ltd. All rights reserved.
